aptStrength.title: Strength
aptStrength.description: Raw physical power, brute force, and the capacity to lift, shove, strike, or break through obstacles using overwhelming strength and effort.

aptAgility.title: Agility
aptAgility.description: Quick reflexes, balance, speed, coordination, and precise control over fine motor movements — especially under pressure or in dynamic environments.

aptVigor.title: Vigor
aptVigor.description: Stamina, resilience, and physical durability — the ability to endure pain, resist harm, and keep going despite exhaustion, illness, or injury.

aptPerception.title: Perception
aptPerception.description: Awareness, observation skills, and the ability to notice details, detect hidden dangers, or sense subtle changes in the environment.

aptIntellect.title: Intellect
aptIntellect.description: Logic, memory, reasoning, and the capacity to analyze information, solve problems, and understand complex or abstract concepts.

aptAdaptability.title: Adaptability
aptAdaptability.description: Improvisation, creativity under pressure, and the ability to react quickly and resourcefully to unexpected situations or unfamiliar tools.

aptCharisma.title: Charisma
aptCharisma.description: Presence, personal magnetism, and the ability to influence others through charm, confidence, or emotional appeal — whether inspiring trust, commanding respect, or bending a crowd to your will.

aptInsight.title: Insight
aptInsight.description: Empathy, intuition, and social sensitivity — the ability to interpret tone, read subtle cues in body language, discern hidden motives, and grasp emotional undercurrents in conversations and situations.

aptWillpower.title: Willpower
aptWillpower.description: Mental fortitude, discipline, and inner resolve — the strength to resist fear, withstand stress, endure manipulation, or remain focused under overwhelming pressure.

actionDice.title: Action Dice
actionDice.description: These dice represent a character's competence, attributes, trained abilities, and any benefits derived from equipment or external assistance. They are rolled to determine the success or failure of an action.

riskDice.title: Risk Dice
riskDice.description: These dice signify the inherent difficulty of an action, its intrinsic danger, environmental threats, or the character's haste or fatigue. They are rolled to ascertain the consequences of an action.

tagMovement.title: Movement
tagMovement.description: This tag is assigned to abilities that involve changing position or manipulating physical space. Rules often interact with this tag to restrict or modify movement effects.

tagConsumable.title: Consumable
tagConsumable.description: This tag is assigned to items that are used up or expended upon activation or after a certain number of uses. Once consumed, their effect is typically gone.

pillarsOfPlay.title: Pillars of Play
pillarsOfPlay.description: The three pillars—Combat, Social, and Exploration—are the core areas of character growth. Advancing in a pillar unlocks abilities related to that theme.

optional-rule.title: Optional Rule
optional-rule.description: An optional rule you may choose to enable for narrative or mechanical flavor.

variant-rule.title: Variant Rule
variant-rule.description: A suggested variation on core mechanics, replacing or modifying the base rule.

experimental-rule.title: Experimental Rule
experimental-rule.description: A playtest feature under development, subject to change in future editions.

tenochca.title: Tenochca
tenochca.description: Tenochca (or Mexica, pronounced [meh-shee-kah]) was the name the Aztecs used for themselves. The term "Aztec" was coined much later by European scholars.
